name: part_016
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY1】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [zkXvWvTX_BE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_016.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Tokimeki Jet Coaster' on stage with a space-themed background and a large screen behind her.
Transition scene with a black screen and light effects leading into the next performance.
Omaru Polka performs 'HOLOGRAM CIRCUS' on a circus-themed stage, starting with an energetic MC section.

subtitles.original: 幽体なんだっけ？ ドドンパ
subtitles.english: Ghosts or something? Dodonpa

subtitles.original: 全心全霊 ちゃんと歓迎して
subtitles.english: Welcome me with all your heart and soul

subtitles.original: どこまでいっか 想像ちゃんと共感して
subtitles.english: Empathize with the imagination of how far we'll go

subtitles.original: ワープしよう 僕が言わんだもん 本当にするんだもん
subtitles.english: Let's warp! I said I would, and I'm really doing it

subtitles.original: 現実超えろ未来 あぁ
subtitles.english: The future that surpasses reality, ah

subtitles.original: 弱点も兵器 七転八倒
subtitles.english: Weaknesses are weapons too, ups and downs

subtitles.original: 千万馬力 独走状態 ワンダランだって
subtitles.english: Ten million horsepower, in the lead, even in Wonderland

subtitles.original: 楽しもう
subtitles.english: Let's have fun

subtitles.original: 面白がれること探し 魂オーバー
subtitles.english: Searching for fun things, soul overflow

subtitles.original: 返事聞かせてくれ
subtitles.english: Let me hear your answer

subtitles.original: 右左なんかじゃない 決めて抜けて一直線
subtitles.english: It's not about left or right, decide and break through

subtitles.original: つまみたくならんなら発射 ライダー ワクワクしてさ
subtitles.english: If you don't want to pick it, launch! Rider, getting excited

subtitles.original: みんな！ 歓声上げていくぞ！ せーの！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Raise your voices! One, two!

subtitles.original: ご機嫌はあそばせのでさぁ！ 合致の出るまで回すぞ！
subtitles.english: Make yourself at home! I'll keep spinning until we're in sync!

subtitles.original: 絶好です 散弾よ そんなこと言っちゃだめ おバカ
subtitles.english: It's perfect, a scattershot! You shouldn't say such things, dummy

subtitles.original: バランス後光 ありがとう 響き越えそう 全部おまけ
subtitles.english: Balanced halo, thank you! Echoing through, all just a bonus

subtitles.original: 虎視眈々でいたいもんだって 意気ガンガンがいいもんだぜ
subtitles.english: I want to be vigilant, and being high-spirited is great

subtitles.original: 方位に感ずり アンテナ張っていなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Must sense the direction and keep my antenna up

subtitles.original: いつでも心はちゃんと純粋で
subtitles.english: My heart is always truly pure

subtitles.original: いたいな 好奇心は絶えず熱心で
subtitles.english: I want to stay that way, with curiosity always eager

subtitles.original: うるさいって言い越せるんだ
subtitles.english: I can shout over the noise

subtitles.original: 調子に乗ったらすぐ飽きられちゃうから あぁ
subtitles.english: If I get cocky, people will get bored quickly, ah

subtitles.original: 最高ならもっと高い場所へ
subtitles.english: If it's the best, then to even higher places

subtitles.original: 千万馬力 独走状態 ワンダランだって
subtitles.english: Ten million horsepower, in the lead, even in Wonderland

subtitles.original: しっかりとつけ 努力とは最後まで諦めないこと
subtitles.english: Remember well, effort means not giving up until the end

subtitles.original: メモっておいて
subtitles.english: Take a note of that

subtitles.original: 本当はベイビー 自信なんかないよ
subtitles.english: To be honest, baby, I have no confidence

subtitles.original: 本当はベイビー 不安ばかりで
subtitles.english: To be honest, baby, I'm full of anxiety

subtitles.original: 泣きそうだって でもねベイビー
subtitles.english: and feel like crying. But you know, baby...

subtitles.original: 挫けないって決めたの だからベイビー
subtitles.english: I've decided not to give up. So baby,

subtitles.original: 挑戦したいの 未開の天 地無限のビートで 行くぜ！
subtitles.english: I want to challenge the unexplored world with an infinite beat! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 全心全霊 ちゃんと歓迎して
subtitles.english: Welcome me with all your heart and soul

subtitles.original: どこまでいっか 想像ちゃんと共感して
subtitles.english: Empathize with the imagination of how far we'll go

subtitles.original: ワープしよう 僕が言わんだもん 本当にするんだもん
subtitles.english: Let's warp! I said I would, and I'm really doing it

subtitles.original: 現実超えろ未来 あぁ
subtitles.english: The future that surpasses reality, ah

subtitles.original: 弱点も兵器 七転八倒
subtitles.english: Weaknesses are weapons too, ups and downs

subtitles.original: 千万馬力 独走状態 ワンダランだって
subtitles.english: Ten million horsepower, in the lead, even in Wonderland

subtitles.original: 楽しもう
subtitles.english: Let's have fun

subtitles.original: 面白がれること探し放題だぜ
subtitles.english: There's no limit to searching for fun things

subtitles.original: 無限のフィールドへ
subtitles.english: To the infinite field

subtitles.original: ハプニングしちゃってもいい 止まらぬ一直線
subtitles.english: It's okay if happenings occur, an unstoppable straight line

subtitles.original: つまりこれが僕の航海なんだ 胸を張れ
subtitles.english: In short, this is my voyage. Stand tall

subtitles.original: 今を生きるその意味を 明くる日もあくるくる日も
subtitles.english: The meaning of living in the now, day after day

subtitles.original: 確かに進め まだ！
subtitles.english: Steadily move forward, not yet done!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: Welcome! あなたは選ばれしポルカサーカス in 幕張のお客さま！
subtitles.english: Welcome! You are the chosen Polka Circus guests in Makuhari!

subtitles.original: やあやあお待たせしました！ とってもハッピーなアイドル、
subtitles.english: Hey there, sorry to keep you waiting! A very happy idol,

subtitles.original: 愉快でかわいいアイドル、そして今は...
subtitles.english: a fun and cute idol, and now...

subtitles.original: ポルカサーカス！ ぜんぶ何が見たい？
subtitles.english: Polka Circus! What do you want to see?

subtitles.original: どんなことでもしてあげる！ 私は座長、その名も
subtitles.english: I'll do anything for you! I'm the ringmaster, name of

subtitles.original: 尾丸ポルカ！ 絶対笑顔にさせちゃうぜ、スマイル！
subtitles.english: Omaru Polka! I'll definitely make you smile, smile!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ最後までライブ楽しんでいこうぜ！
subtitles.english: Now then, let's enjoy the live until the very end!

subtitles.original: 準備はできてるか？ Are you ready?
subtitles.english: Are you ready? Are you ready?

subtitles.original: さあさあ近くにおいで きっと誰もが仰天
subtitles.english: Come, come, step closer, I'm sure everyone will be amazed

subtitles.original: 奇想天外なショーの始まりさ！
subtitles.english: It's the start of an extraordinary show!

subtitles.original: じっと惹かれるでしょう ほら恐れずにね
subtitles.english: You'll be drawn in, right? Look, don't be afraid

subtitles.original: それでは準備OKですか？
subtitles.english: Now then, are you ready?

subtitles.original: 愉快な動物たち 玉乗りピエロ
subtitles.english: Cheerful animals, ball-balancing clowns

subtitles.original: ハラハラドキドキしちゃうでしょう
subtitles.english: It'll make your heart race, won't it?

subtitles.original: 魔縄くぐらせ 輪渡りして
subtitles.english: Passing through the magic rope, jumping through hoops

subtitles.original: ちょっとぐらいのドジなんて ご愛嬌よ！
subtitles.english: A little clumsy mistake is just a charming touch!

subtitles.original: Come on, light up! 喝采起きろライブ
subtitles.english: Come on, light up! Let the cheers ring out, live

subtitles.original: 見逃さないで もっと騒いで もっとお手を叩け
subtitles.english: Don't look away, make more noise, clap your hands more

subtitles.original: ほら 本気出して置いて
subtitles.english: Come on, show me your true strength
